website_summaries.verdict: Delivers everything you need in an emergency tool and flashlight, but it's kind of expensive.
pros: Gives you 7 different flashlight modes, so you can match whatever situation you're facing
Will run for several hours on a full charge
Will project the light from the LED over a distance of up to several hundred feet
Also can use USB to charge it
cons: Costs more than other solar powered flashlights
Not as bright as some others

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice flashlight. Works great for recharging my cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: wadkins

customer_reviews.title: Good flashlight to replace my old one
customer_reviews.text: Very good and multi-function flashlight. It is going to be useful when I am in emergency at home.
customer_reviews.author: TyleSailor

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight has many features that will come in handy when needed. All the features make this a really great purchase, esp. the water resistant and solar charging.
customer_reviews.author: SuperS

customer_reviews.title: Must-have product
customer_reviews.text: I love the different features on this flashlight. The window hammer, seatbelt knife, compass, and USB port are awesome. I love that you’re able to charge your phone with this flashlight. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Hillando

customer_reviews.title: Now, none of them charge, total waste of money. I would look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, 1 wouldn't work, they were great about replacing it. They need strong light to charge. Update: None of them work. Only gave them a 1 star rating because it wouldn't allow Zero.
customer_reviews.author: Lori  Trent

customer_reviews.title: Too many great functions on this tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. A lot of tools in one. The only reason I am rating this a 4 star instead of 5 is because the red flashing lights isn't just red flashing lights. It flashes red and blue, which signify police. Technically, it is illegal in my state and most States to flash red and blue lights if you are not a police officer. I would honestly prefer not to have the blue lights even though it would probably get people to slow down if I am stuck on the side of the road.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge phone and compass doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Charger only worked for a few minutes and doesn’t work at all. The compass doesn’t work either. I keep finding crappy products like this on amazon. Totally sucks! You can’t even stand the light on a table to shoot light on the ceiling because the compass plastic bulges out with a curved surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-function Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Great Flashlight with Window Breaker, Seat Belt Cutter, Compass and EMS This Flashlight is great for all your needs I highly everyone should get one
customer_reviews.author: L w

customer_reviews.title: Sort of performs as advertised.  Dial back your expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Flash is fairly bright for close use. USB charger works, and has a tiny red light which flashes when charging. No charge indicator to indicate remaining life of battery, though. Compass has to be very still and perfectly level, which is to say, marginal. The magnets won't hold the device on a vertical metal surface, and they come out when it is removed from that surface. The side light is pretty decent, and the emergency flasher is quite bright red/blue. that's probably the best feature. NOTE TO AMAZON: Please tell us when a product is Chinese. Don't make us wait to notice the poor English on an instruction sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Cool Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight has a lot useful functions with high quality. I like the emergency flash mode with red lights, it works good in some situations. And the usb charger function should be the best one. can charge smartphone in emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Beware. Head light is 200 not 2000 lumens and side is 150.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Same flashlight you can find on other sites for upwards of $75. The light is the key point for me. Flexibility for standing the flashlight on end for a work light come in handy. I keep in on our window sill at how for its always charged. I've using this for a couple of hours and the charge held up fine. Only problem is my wife wants her own - so better buy 2. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Wmt

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight and accessories, but seller didn't send an instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight with wonderful accessories, but the instructions were in Chinese, so we don't want to miss all of the potential features. I wish the seller would have provided a manual showing what everything does. Otherwise, it was a nice Christmas present for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good flashlight that has a lot of features. The brightness level really surprises me and I can use it at night with a better sight than the old one. Except for the normal lightning function, it can also be used as an alarm light when you have emergency when driving on the highway. The design of magnetic shell allows it to stick firmly to my car. Also, the hammer and small blade attached to the body make me feel safe when driving, so I put it in my car so I can use it any time I want. Generally, it’s one of the best flashlight that I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Tiange Yang

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the solar powered flashlight for my car. WOW! This thing is amazing! It's a flashlight, a two color (white or red at the press of a button) multi LED flashing emergency light, a window breaker, a seat belt cutter, and even has a compass! It charges via solar panel or micro USB and can even charge a cel-phone from it's standard USB output. It's the Swiss Army Knife of flashlights! The light is really solidly made and does everything it's supposed to do. I'd recommend it to friends 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Brightness of the light and quality of production of the system
customer_reviews.text: I really like the brightness of the main light and was impressed with the emergency lights on the side designed to attract attention and pinpoint your location. The glass-breaker and the cutting edge to slice through seat belts are something that's impressive and that I hope I will never need. A friend when looking at it said you couldn't get a good light like this for under $100.00, but when he looked it over and heard the price he was amazed. He is a retired EMT with the Fire Department here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Received it late January and now, late March does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Survival Tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 , 2 I gave as gifts to friends who hike and do off roading , and 2 I kept for myself for each vehicle. Great , and I would say essential survival tool. This item has a usb charger , very bright flash light, a flashing signal light , a punch to break your car window in an emergency , and many other survival gadgets on it .
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Combs

customer_reviews.title: First day seems great, multi function already charged !!
customer_reviews.text: I think this looks great & it has multi functions that will be ever so handy. It came fully charged. It is so very BRIGHT!! I will repost after a week of use. The only drawback might be the directions are written by a non-English speaking person. I think I can figure it out but it does make it a bit difficult .If I get them all figured out I think this will get five stars from me. Good and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight have 7 mode optical functions for use which is amazing! Came in handy when we need it and not too heavy. Great for emergency or camping! Really love it!
customer_reviews.author: lovesophie

customer_reviews.title: A must-have flashlight for the car!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is just the right one I need as a must-have for my car. Thr front lighy has 3 lighting modes. Even on the solar panel, there are 10 small LED lights with 2 lighting modes. I also like the small hammer on the front side. It would be very helpful to break the window glass for trapped-in-the-car situation. At the end of the flashlight, there is also a compass. When you screw off the compass, you'll find a usb charging port. This is a very convenient and handy flashlight!
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband He’s a truck driver Be loves it Sets it on dash to charge And uses it daily He loves the two color lights Universal Very handy I’m buying one for my car
customer_reviews.author: Funtimes2012

customer_reviews.title: Might be fragile
customer_reviews.text: Dropped the light on a wooden floor and the light wont stop running thru its features. Cannot turn off the light. The light is useless now
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Deceptiin
customer_reviews.text: Only had one flashlight. Add made it sound like there were 2 1 bid and 1 Smaller light. I would not have bought just 1 light other deals were better
customer_reviews.author: mike jones

customer_reviews.title: very good product and it is very useful for me
customer_reviews.text: I always want a flashlight and I searched on the Amazon for a long time. Finally, I chose this one, it does not disappoint me. it has many types of light, white one, flashing one and the light is very strong. It is easy to see very clear in the dark. Also, it is a good window broker and i can put it on my car for the safety. And there is a compass to show the sirection. This one is really good and with a lot of functions.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Bright and well built flashlight
customer_reviews.text: It is conveniently charged by sitting at the window. The brightness is immense to shine at a great and wide distance. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend, thinking he would love this handy flashlight in his car. I loved it so much, and I ended up keeping it at home. It is solar powered, but can also be charged using an usb cable. It has so many functions, and I'm still discovering. Overall very handy gadget, I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Zend

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift worth giving to loved ones this holiday.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a total of 3 flashlights for my family after I had mine and I loved it so much I .A fantastic product. Solid state, very strong bulb, other emergency tools on it like a glass shatterer, a wire cutterrer which doubles as a seat-belt cutterrer, magnet,compass.batttery bank, water resistant and solar charging. Also comes packaged very nicely and got here super early. Definitely designed and produced with safety in mind by caring people!
customer_reviews.author: Quelddy

customer_reviews.title: GMom
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift and she loves it ! She said it will come in handy when she has power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Cydneybabygirl Davis

customer_reviews.title: Lighht
customer_reviews.text: This is well built. It works great not sure about the battery life yet haven’t used it for a full day or haven’t used or tried to use the solar charging part but I’ll keep posted
customer_reviews.author: Realist

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The light has 3 modes: 100% brightness, 50% brightness, strobe. It includes a safety hammer, a cutting knife and a compass. The output in the bottom can charge mobile and other digital devices. Solar battery is very good for outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Good light love the magnet worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good flash light, well made and a nice grip to it, for what I payed for it’s worth it. One of the few good flash lights I’ve purchased on amazon. The only down side to this light is that it 200 Lumens it should be 400 and I wouldn’t mind buying more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful item
customer_reviews.text: It does so many things, perfect for keeping in a car
customer_reviews.author: sania

customer_reviews.title: No manual or troubleshooting help
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years the switch is broken and I can't find a way to contact the company to replace the flashlight. Amazon says the company is "Subsistance" but Google can't find that company. What good is a lifetime warranty if there is no company to back it up????
customer_reviews.author: Minnie HaHa

customer_reviews.title: Nice flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them for gifts. Great flashlight for the car
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Impressions .
customer_reviews.text: Just received this looks and appears to be sturdy haven’t tested it is far is water resistant or battery life. Only giving it four stars at this point because I haven’t had a chance to use it. Overall first impressions are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well liked.
customer_reviews.text: They were really liked and the brightest of their lights surprised them.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use this daily at my hotel for room inspections. Very durable and bright too.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for your car in case of emergencies
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is sooo amazing! I just received it and it far surpassed my expectations. It is also very portable. The little blade was very useful for outdoor activities and camping and the light is also very bright. The USB chargers works remarkably as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best flashlight I've ever bought. I must have dropped it so many times in water, concrete floor and still working. Every feature it has works the way it should be. From cutting glass window, to cutting seat belt.. I highly recommend this product.. Awesome buy!...
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: No need to waste batteries
customer_reviews.text: It's bright. I leave it on the porch to stay charged. I'm always on the lookout for GOOD solar products.
customer_reviews.author: English teacher

customer_reviews.title: Brighter
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is much brighter than usual ones. It is bright even in the daytime in a room.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I own this light before and I really like it but when I bought this one it can't keep its charge for nothing, really disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is the MOST versatile flashlight I’ve ever purchased. It is very solid and sturdy. I carry it with me at all times.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: This is what they think brightest looks like
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be well made but if you are searching for a TRULY BRIGHT flashlight save your money... cuz this doesn't even come close
customer_reviews.author: KlydeMD

customer_reviews.title: Don't underestimate the flash light that does MORE then expected.
customer_reviews.text: Light IS bright, red flasher is a great thing being close to, and working in traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I want to have one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solar flashlight. It can be used for a long time with a single charge
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Good flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Can charge by solar or usb cord. Like knowing that I no longer need batteries. Nice and bright, and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight is very good quality, and lighting color is very cool. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Brightest and Best LED Tactical Flashlights Set with Water Resistant : 200 Bright Lumen Flashlight & Mini 150 Lumen Flashlight,Solar Powered & USB Rechargeable,Perfect for Indoor & Outdoor, Camping
product_meta.description:
A Multi-function Solar Escape Rescue Flashlight 

LED Mutipurpose Solar Flashlight Car Escape Emergency Tool contains a built-in seat belt cutter, glass window breaker, outdoor compass, safety flashlight, and a emergency power bank, helping you during a indoors blackout or tight, short on space work, outdoors on a camping ,a hiking adventure and a road travel, necessary for vehicle emergencies.

All-In-One Flashlight 

Featuring 7 working modes, our flashlight lets you choose the lighting that is suitable for you situation. Use the solid headlight to finding your way in the dark or flashing headlight to warn others, the side white lamp during blackouts, working or camping, or the side flashing red light mode during vehicle emergencies. 

Car Escape Emergency Tool 

During the vehicle emergencies, this car escape emergency tool will be help you to rescue yourself and your loved ones. A seat belt cutter to cut the jammed seat belt, a glass window breaker to break the stuck window, a outdoor compass to show the direction, a solar flashlight to find the way or warn others and a emergency power bank to charge your smart devices.

Rechargeable & Reliable 

With a built-in 2000mAh 18650 battery, it could be charged with USB cable (Included) or solar power. The weather resistant anodized aluminum alloy body is easy to grip, built-in magnet for hands-free usage, which is very convenient and will last for a long time.

Warm Tips: The Flashlight hammer is very sharp. Please keep away from children and use it carefully.
feature_bullets: Car Flashlight LED Emergency Tactical Multi-function Torch Flashlight Tool with Window Breaker, Seat Belt Cutter, Compass for Travel, Camping & Emergencies

【7 Working Modes Flashlight】: Headlight (4-6hrs) -High, Medium and Flashing, Side White Lamp (4-7hrs) - High and Medium, Side Red Light (6-7hrs) - Flashing and Slow-flashing; Press the switch to change working mode and long press 3s to change working LED.Its beam can be focused that throws light up to an impressive 700 feet
【HANDS-FREE】: With a powerful magnet on the side of the flashlight head, you could attach it to the car or other metallic surface to use as a work light, camping lamp or emergency warning light

【Reliable and Necessary】: Flashlight is water resistant & shock resistant for use under the most rugged, emergency condition.It comes with a weather resistant anodized aluminum alloy body, easy to grip, tail with a compass for outdoors; Not just for auto emergencies, also great for working, camping, or hiking as it's designed to withstand lots of abuse

LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We love these flashlights so much and we know you will too. Not only is the Subsistent LED Tactical Flashlight Set covering all your tactical needs, but it also comes with a fully-fledged guarantee of a lifetime: 100% money back in case you don’t find it useful in your excursions and explorations kit.
